Name: Retired Waves
About the game: Retired Waves is a narrative video game by Bing Liu. It lasts about 30 minutes and has no traditional mechanics, goals, or objectives. Instead, it tells the story of a being wandering through their thoughts and reflecting on the meaning of architecture. All soundtracks are produced by Michael Hoiming Du. There is one way you can play this game for free. Because the playtime isn't long, you could purchase the game and return it after you have played through.
